text: The Ladykillers is a 2004 American crime comedy movie. It is set in Mississippi and stars Tom Hanks. It was directed by the Coen brothers. It is a remake of the original 1955 movie of the same name. == Other websites == * Category:2004 comedy movies Category:2004 crime movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:2000s English- language movies Category:2000s movie remakes Category:Movies set in Mississippi Category:Movies directed by the Coen brothers Category:American movie remakes
title: The Ladykillers (2004 movie)
